title: The bloudy Babylon: or, A collection of some particulars concerning the persecution raging in France against the Protestants from the peace of Reswick, to the martyrdom of the Reverend Monsieur Brousson, inclusively. In a letter to a lord.
author: Gaujac, Peter Gally de.
publisher: printed for George Huddleston, at the Black-moor's Head near Exeter-Change in the Strand,
